subsection.name: Java Version
subsection.p: Java 1.5 is required to run XTraxker. Language syntax new to JDK 1.5 has been used in the development and it will not run on an earlier version of java.

subsection.name: Database Version
subsection.p: XTracker has been tested with HypersonicDB, MySQL 4+ and 5b but should work well with any database supported by Hibernate.

subsection.name: Servlet Server Version
subsection.p: XTracker was developed on Tomcat 5.x but should just fine on any servlet container that supports the standards.
